sigils.Red Gem: This card provides one red gem.
sigils.Orange Gem: This card provides one orange gem.
sigils.Yellow Gem: This card provides one yellow gem.
sigils.Green Gem: This card provides one green gem.
sigils.Blue Gem: This card provides one blue gem.
sigils.Purple Gem: This card provides one purple gem.
sigils.Prism Gem: This card provides a gem of any color.
sigils.Gray Gem: This card provides a gray gem.
sigils.Airborne: This card attacks the opposing spacedirectly instead of the opposing card.
sigils.Alchemy: Once per turn during your play step, you may spend 3 energy to draw from the side deck.
sigils.Ant Eater: When any Ant you control perishesby combat, you may place this card in its space.
sigils.Ant Spawner: When played, search any Ant card with a lower cost than this one into your hand.
sigils.Apparition's Favorite: When Played, search any common Spectre card from your main deck to your hand.
sigils.Aquanaut: if the opposing card has the "Waterborne" sigil, this card's strikes will damage it instead of dealing damage directly.
sigils.Arcane Ledger: All effects triggered directly by you playing cards will be triggered twice.
sigils.Armored: The first time this card would be damaged, negate that damage.
sigils.August Aura: All other cards you control gain 2 power.
sigils.Avarice: Once per turn during your play step, you may discard a card from your hand to search one card from your discard pile.
sigils.Backstab: When this card perishes, take direct damage equivalent to its current power.
sigils.Bastion: When this card would take damage, it instead takes half as much, rounded up.
sigils.Bat Lord: While this card is on the field, you may play Bat cards for 1 bone.
sigils.Battery Bearer: When played, gain 1 max energy, then refill 1 energy.
sigils.Bees Within: When this card takes damage, search a "Bee" into your hand.
sigils.Bell Ringer: Each time the bell is rung, this card gains 1 power, to a maximum of 5.
sigils.Betrayal: When this card perishes, discard the top card of your main deck.
sigils.Bifurcated Strike: This card strikes both spaces adjacent to the opposing space, instead of it.
sigils.Blood Battery: Each time you play a card costing 6 or more energy, gain 1 blood token. Blood tokens are persistent, and can be consumed to reduce the blood cost of a card in your hand by 1 blood.
sigils.Bloodlust: Each time this card kills another card, it gains 1 power.
sigils.Bloodsucker: When this card damages another card, it gains 1 health, to a maximum of 5.
sigils.blue archmagus sigil 2: When any gem-providing card you control perishes, draw a card.
sigils.Body of Dust: When paying a card's cost, each gem you shatter counts as 2 shattered gems of that color.
sigils.Bolthound's Epic Sigil: When this card strikes an empty space, its strikes deal damage directly.
sigils.Bone Digger: During your end step, gain 1 bone.
sigils.Bone King: This card provides 4 bones when it perishes.
sigils.Brittle: This card perishes immediately after attacking.
sigils.Burrower: When an empty space on your sidewould be struck, this card moves to that space first.
sigils.Carefree: This card's stats are unaffected by anyother sigils.
sigils.Chew Toy: When played, search any Hound card from your main deck into your hand.
sigils.Chromatic Abberation: All gem-providing cards you control provide a gem of any color.
sigils.Circuit Dependent: This card perishes when not in a circuit.
sigils.Clinger: Each time you place a card, move this card to the closest open space to it.
sigils.Colony: All other cards you control with the "Colony" sigil gain 1 power.
sigils.Convalesce: During your end step, this card gains 1 health, if it has less than 5.
sigils.Corpse Eater: When a card you control perishes by combat, you may place this card in its space.
sigils.Creeping Outwards: On the second draw step after this card was played, search a (new card) and place it in this card's space.
sigils.Detonator: This card deals 3 damage to adjacent and opposing cards after it perishes by combat.
sigils.Divination: When played, look at and rearrange the top 3 cards of your deck.
sigils.Double Death: When another card you control perishes, any effects resulting from its perishing, including bones, will happen twice.
sigils.Double Strike: This card strikes twice when it attacks.
sigils.Dust Barrier: After each time you shatter a gem, thenext time this card would be damaged, negate that damage.
sigils.Dust Eater: During your end step, you may shattera gem. If you do not, this card loses 1 health.
sigils.Dusted Knuckles: When this card kills another, activate the effects of any activated ability paid by shattering a gem, written on any card you control. If the ability may only be used once per turn, this does not prevent you from using it again this turn, and may still be used if you have already used it this turn.
sigils.Dust Gatherer: Once per turn, when you shatter a gem, you may search your side deck or discard for a common or side deck card that provides a gem.
sigils.Dustmaker: When this card kills another, draw a card from your side deck.
sigils.Dust Power: Each time you shatter a gem, this card gains 1 power, to a maximum of 5.
sigils.Dust Tempest: Each time you shatter a gem, move a card you control to an empty space on your side.
sigils.Dynamo: On your draw step, this card provides 1 additional max energy.
sigils.Fecundity: When played, search another copy of this card from your main deck.
sigils.Fledgling: On your next draw step, search a (new card) and place it in this card's space.The new card inherits any effects applied to the old, and starts with the same amount of health missing.
sigils.Foresight: Each time you search, look at, or draw cards from any deck during your play step, this card gains 1 power, to a maximum of 5.
sigils.Frog Friend: During your end step, shift this card to an adjacent lane, and search and place any Amphibian card, costing up to 1 blood or 1 mox of any type, in its previous lane.
sigils.Frozen Away: When this card perishes, search and place a (new card) in its space.
sigils.Fully Loaded: When killed, the next card placed in this space gains 1 power for the first strike of each attack.
sigils.Gem Animator: All gem-providing cards you control gain 1 power.
sigils.Gem Dependent: If you control no gem-providing cards, this card perishes.
sigils.Gem Digger: During your end step, this card generates 1 bone for every gem-providing card you control.
sigils.Gem Guardian: Attacks against all gem-providing cards you control are negated.
sigils.Gem Instability: When any gem-providing card you control takes damage, it deals the card that damaged it 1 damage.
sigils.Gem Intercept: When a gem-providing card you control would be damaged, you may swap its place with this card first.
sigils.Gem Repair: When a Side Deck Mox card you controlperishes by combat, you may draw a card from your side deck and place it in its place.
sigils.Generous: When played, shuffle 1 card from your hand back into your deck, then draw 2 cards.
sigils.Gift Bearer: When this card perishes by combat, draw a card.
sigils.Golduggery: When this card kills another card, gain 1 gold token. Gold tokens are persistent, and can be consumed to reduce the blood cost of a card in your hand by 1 blood.
sigils.Grave Recovery: When played, add the top card from your discard pile into your hand.
sigils.Guardian: When the enemy places a card, if the opposing space is empty, this card moves to it.
sigils.Handy: When played, discard your hand, and draw an equivalent number of cards, plus one.
sigils.Haunted Stonework: All other cards you control with "Made of Stone" gain 1 power, and all cards in yor hand with "Made of Stone" cost 3 fewer bones to play.
sigils.Haunter: After this card perishes, the next card placed in its space gains all of this card's sigils, except this one.
sigils.Haunting Reflection: After this card perishes, the next card placed in its space will have power equal to that of the card currently opposing it, or 0 powerif there isn't one.
sigils.Heart of Dust: Each time you shatter a gem, this card gains 1 health, if it has less than 5.
sigils.Hearty Offering: When sacrificed, this card provides blood equal to its current health.
sigils.Hefty: During your end step, move this card to an adjacent lane, pushing other cards in its way into adjacent empty spaces if needed.
sigils.Hoarder: When played, search any 1 common card from your main deck to your hand.
sigils.Hopper: During your end step, this moves to any empty space on your side.
sigils.Hotfix: When a card from your side deck perishes by combat, draw a card from your side deck and place it in its place.
sigils.Humgry: When played, the opponent must discard a card of their choice from their hand, if they have one.
sigils.Important: When this card perishes, the player who controls it takes 99999 direct damage.
sigils.Infinifold: Infinifold: Once per turn, shatter a gem to permanently double this card's power, to a maximum of 9000.
sigils.Inky Defense: The first time this card would be attacked, it moves to an adjacent empty space, reducing the attacker's power to 0 in the process.
sigils.Insta-Bomber: When played, deal 10 damage to any card on the field.
sigils.Intraspectrum: For each color of gem provided on your side not represented in this card's cost, this card has 1 additional power.
sigils.Ironsides: This card can only be damaged by the card directly opposing it.
sigils.Leader: Adjacent cards gain 1 power for their first strike of each attack.
sigils.Loaded: When this card perishes by combat, draw a total of 3 cards from your deck and/or side deck.
sigils.Loose Bones: During your end step, move this card to an adjacent empty lane, generating 1 bone.
sigils.Loose Tail: The first time this card would be attacked, shift it to an adjacent empty lane, and search and place a (new card) in its old space to receive the attack instead.
sigils.Looter: When this card deals damage directly, draw a card for each point of damage it dealt.
sigils.Made of Stone: This card's power cannot be reduced, and it is immune to "Touch of Death"
sigils.Magickal Lift: All gem-providing cards you control attack their opposing spaces directly.
sigils.Many Lives: This card does not perish when sacrificed.
sigils.Marked Hand: When played, discard all but three of the cards in your hand, if you have more than 3 cards.
sigils.Marrowmania: While this card is on the field, when any card on either side of the field perishes, any effects resulting from its perishing will happen twice.
sigils.Mass Grave: During your end step, gain 3 bones.
sigils.Mental Gemnastics: When played, draw a number of cards from your main deck equal to how many gems the cards on your side provide in total, and add one to your hand, then shuffle the rest back into your deck.
sigils.Mighty Leap: If this card's space would be struckdirectly, this card takes the damage instead.
sigils.Morsel: When this card is sacrificed, the card it is sacrificed to gains power and health equal to this card's power and health.
sigils.Mox Dropper: During your end step, this card shifts to an adjacent lane. Search any gem-providing card from your side deck and place it in its previous space.
sigils.Noble Sacrifice: This card provides 2 blood when sacrificed.
sigils.Omni Strike: This card will strike all opposing cards when attacking. If there are none, it strikes the opposing space once.
sigils.Overcharge: During your end step, you may pay 3 energy. If you do not, this card loses 1 health.
sigils.Overcoat: All gem-providing cards you control provide a gem of any color.
sigils.Overclocked: When this card damages an opposing card, its owner gains 1 max energy and refills 1 energy.
sigils.Piercing: When this strikes a card, it also deals half as much damage, rounded down, directly.
sigils.Poisonous: During the opponent's end step, the card opposing this one loses 1 health.
sigils.Power Creep: During each of your end steps, all cards you control gain 1 power on their first strike of each attack, to a maximum of 5.
sigils.Power Digger: If this card is in a circuit during your end step, gain 2 bones.
sigils.Power Protector: While this card is in a circuit, all Conduit cards you control cannot be attacked.
sigils.Prepared Sacrifice: This card may not be sacrificed the turn it is played.
sigils.Puppet Master: Cards you control with "Brittle" will not perish from it, but will immediately perish when this card dies.
sigils.Purist: While this card is on the field, the opposing card's sigils are negated.
sigils.Rabbit Hole: When played, search 1 "Rabbit" into your hand.
sigils.Raging Flames: During your end step, this card loses 1 health and gains 1 power.
sigils.Rampager: During your end step, this card swaps positions with an adjacent card.
sigils.Rattle 'em!: During your attack step the turn this card is played, all cards you control may target any enemy space when they attack.
sigils.Ravenous: During your end step, you may sacrifice one card. If you do not, this card loses 1 health.
sigils.Re-Index: When played, search 1 card each from your deck and discard that costs up to 6 energy.
sigils.Rise Again: When played, search 1 card that costs upto 6 bones from your discard pile, and play it in any empty space on your side without paying its cost.
sigils.Rooted: This card cannot be moved from the space it was placed in until it perishes.
sigils.Rotting: During your end step, this card loses 1 health and power.
sigils.Ruby Heart: When this card perishes, search a"Ruby Mox" from your side deck or discard and place in its place.
sigils.Scavenger: Each time an opposing card perishes, gain 1 bone.
sigils.Scorching Skin: When struck, this card deals 2 damage to the striker.
sigils.Scrawny: When this card is sacrificed to play a card, that card loses power and health equal to this card's.
sigils.Scrounger: When this card kills another, gain 1 bone.
sigils.Sea Shanty: All cards you control with the "Brittle"sigil gain 1 power.
sigils.Search Engine: When played, search any card that costs energy from your main deck into your hand.
sigils.Sentry: When a card is placed or moved in front of this card, it is dealt 1 damage.
sigils.Sharp Quills: When this card is damaged, the card that damaged it takes 1 damage.
sigils.Short Lived: This card perishes during your end step.
sigils.Side Hustle: When this card deals damage directly,draw a card from your side deck for each point of damage it dealt.
sigils.Skeleton Crew: During your end step, this card shifts to an adjacent lane. Play a "Skeleton" from your side deck in its previous space.
sigils.Snake Eyes: When this card perishes, roll a d6.Take direct damage equal to the number rolled. The same amount of damage is dealt to the opposing card.
sigils.Sniper: When attacking, this card may target any enemy space.
sigils.Soul Stealer: When this kills a card, gain 1 max energy, refill 1 energy, and increase this card's health by 1, to a maximum of 5.
sigils.Spine Walker: During your end step, move this card to an adjacent empty lane to generate 2 bones.
sigils.Spiritual Persistence: When played, select 1 card. The next card to be played in that card's space after it perishes will inherit all of its sigils.
sigils.Sprinter: During your end step, move this card to an adjacent empty space.
sigils.Squirrel Shedder: During your end step, this card shifts to an adjacent lane. Play a "Squirrel" from your side deck in its previous space.
sigils.Stacker: You may place this card on top of another card with "Stacker" for free to form a stack.
sigils.Stalker: The end step after this card is played, it gains 1 power on the first strike of each attack.
sigils.Steel Trap: When this card perished by combat, the opposing card perishes.
sigils.Sturdy: This card may not be destroyed with the hammer.
sigils.Swapper: When this takes damage, swap its current health and power.
sigils.Synthetic Gem: This card provides a gem, but cannot satisfy any card's mox cost.
sigils.Taunt: Strikes targeting adjacent cards hit this card instead.
sigils.Tomb Digger: During your end step, gain 2 bones.
sigils.Touch of Death: When this damages another card, that card perishes.
sigils.Trifurcated Strike: When attacking, this card strikes the opposing space and the spaces adjacent to it.
sigils.Trinket Bearer: When played, draw 3 cards from your main deck, add 1 to your hand, and shuffle the other 2 back into your deck.
sigils.Unearthed Pack: When played, shuffle your discard pile, pull out and look at five cards from it, and add two of them to your hand. Discard the others.
sigils.Unkillable: This card returns to your hand when it perishes.
sigils.Vessel Animator: Vessel cards on your side gain 1 power.
sigils.Vessel Defender: Vessel cards on your side cannot be attacked.
sigils.Waterborne: Strikes targeting this card deal damage directly instead.
sigils.Wavering Allegiance: This card strikes either diagonally-adjacent space when it attacks. If that space is then empty, it moves there.
sigils.Witching Hour: All Spectre cards you control gain 1 power.
sigils.Worthy Sacrifice: This card provides 3 blood when sacrificed.
sigils.tech spam sigil lol: All cards you control that cost energy and have exactly 1 base power gain 1 power.
sigils.end step energy idk: During your end step, gain 1 max energy.
sigils.(Color) Conduit: This card may complete a circuit,spanning the spaces between it and any other cardwith a "Conduit" sigil. It provides a (Color) gem only when doing so.
sigils.Red Conduit: This card may complete a circuit,spanning the spaces between it and any other cardwith a "Conduit" sigil. It provides a red gem only when doing so.
sigils.Orange Conduit: This card may complete a circuit,spanning the spaces between it and any other cardwith a "Conduit" sigil. It provides an orange gem only when doing so.
sigils.Yellow Conduit: This card may complete a circuit,spanning the spaces between it and any other cardwith a "Conduit" sigil. It provides a yellow gem only when doing so.
sigils.Green Conduit: This card may complete a circuit,spanning the spaces between it and any other cardwith a "Conduit" sigil. It provides a green gem only when doing so.
sigils.Blue Conduit: This card may complete a circuit,spanning the spaces between it and any other cardwith a "Conduit" sigil. It provides a blue gem only when doing so.
sigils.Purple Conduit: This card may complete a circuit,spanning the spaces between it and any other cardwith a "Conduit" sigil. It provides a purple gem only when doing so.
sigils.Airborne Conduit: This card may complete a circuit.The cards between it and another card with any"Conduit" sigil attack the opposing space directlyinstead of the opposing card.
sigils.Armor Conduit: This card may complete a circuit. When this card is played, the cards between it and another card with any "Conduit" sigil will negate the next damage they would receive. Cards placed in its circuit after this card is played will also negate the next damage they would receive.
sigils.Attack Conduit: This card may complete a circuit between itself and another card with any "Conduit" sigil. Cards within the circuit have 1 additional power on their first strike each time they attack.
sigils.Energy Conduit: While this card completes a circuit, you may play cards between it and another card with any "Conduit" sigil without paying their energycost.
sigils.Heal Conduit: This card may complete a circuit. The cards between it and another card with any "Conduit" sigil regain 1 health during your end step, up to their maximum.
sigils.Null Conduit: This card may complete a circuit, spanning the spaces between it and any other card with any "Conduit" sigil.
sigils.Overclock Conduit: This card may complete a circuit. The cards between it and another card with any "Conduit" sigil gain 2 power for their first strike, but perish during your end step.
sigils.Spawn Conduit: This card may complete a circuit. During your end step, search and place any common or side deck card that costs up to 3 energy, in any empty space between this card and any other card with any "Conduit" sigil.
sigils.Were-Conduit: This card may complete a circuit between itself and another card with any "Conduit" sigil. If a card within the circuit has any "Alter" sigil, You may toggle its mark for free during your play step.
sigils.Bifurcate when Powered: If in a circuit, this card strikes to the left and right of the opposing space, instead of the opposing space.
sigils.Buff when Powered: When in a circuit, this card gains 2 power.
sigils.Gift when Powered: If this card is in a circuit when it perishes by combat, draw a card.
sigils.Rebuild when Powered: If this card is in a circuit when it perishes, return it to your hand instead of discarding it.
sigils.Sniper when Powered: If this card is in a circuit, it may target any enemy space when it attacks.
sigils.Trifurcate when Powered: If in a circuit, this card strikes the opposing space as well as the spaces adjacent to it.
sigils.Waterborne when Powered: When this card is in a circuit, strikes targeting it will deal damage directly instead.
sigils.Bomb Latcher: When this card perishes by combat, select a card on the board. That card will deal 3 damage to adjacent and opposing cards when it perishes by combat.
sigils.Bone Latcher: When this card perishes by combat, select 1 card on the board. Starting on its owner's next turn, That card will perish after the next time it attacks.
sigils.Circuit Latcher: When this card perishes by combat, select 1 card on the board. That card may complete a circuit, and counts as having the "Null Conduit" sigil.
sigils.Shield Latcher: When this card perishes by combat, select 1 card on the board. The next time that card would be damaged, negate that damage.
sigils.Alter Template: During your end step, toggle this card's mark. While marked, schphlingy wingy

During your end step, toggle this card's mark. While marked, this card loses the above sigils and gains 2 power.
sigils.Alter Flight: During your end step, toggle this card's mark. While marked, this card gains 1 power, and its strikes deal damage directly instead of to the opposing card.
sigils.Alter Mega: During your end step, toggle this card's mark. While marked, this card gains 4 power.
sigils.Alter Poison: During your end step, toggle this card's mark. While this card is marked, any damage it deals to another card will make that card instantly perish.
During your end step, toggle this card's mark. While marked, this card's base power is reduced to 1, but any damage it deals to another card will make that card instantly perish.
sigils.Alter Quills: During your end step, toggle this card's mark. While marked, this card deals 1 damage to any card that damages it.
sigils.Alter Sniper: During your end step, toggle this card's mark. While marked, this card loses all the above sigils and gains the ability to target any enemy space when it attacks.
sigils.Power Cannon: During your end step, toggle this card's mark. While marked, this card loses all other sigils, gains 3 power, and may target any enemy space when it attacks.

sigils.Blood Rage: Once per turn during your play step, sacrifice a card to instantly toggle this card's mark.
sigils.Bonehorn: During your play step, you may pay 3 energy to gain 1 bone.
sigils.Bulldoze: During your play step, you may pay 2 energy to move this card to an  adjacent lane, pushing other cards in its way into adjacent empty spaces if needed.
sigils.Disentomb: During your play step, you may pay 1 bone to search 1 "Skeleton" from your side deck.
sigils.Dooming Dust: Once per turn during your play step, shatter a gem you control to give 1 card you control 2 additional power on the first strike of its next attack. That card will perish after attacking.
sigils.Drain: During your play step, you may sacrifice 1 card in this card's stack to give this card 1 power, to amaximum of 5.
sigils.Dusting Blademaster: Once per turn, shatter a gem you control to cause all gem-providing cards you control to gain 1 power until your next end step, and cause this card to strike twice on its next attack.

sigils.Enlarge: During your play step, you may pay 2 bones to give this card 1 health.
sigils.Equivalent Exchange: Once per turn during your play step, you may discard a card from your hand to search a card from your discard that shares one or more tribes with the discarded card.
sigils.Extreme Rage: Once per turn during your play step, sacrifice 2 cards, or a card worth at least 2 blood, to instantly toggle this card's mark.
sigils.Fossil Fuel: During your play step, you may pay 3 bones to gain 1 max energy and refill 1 energy.
sigils.Glooming Dust: Once per turn during your play step, shatter a gem you control to reduce the power of any card on the field by 1.
sigils.Marrow Rage: During your play step, pay 2 bones toinstantly toggle this card's mark.
sigils.Pay Tribute: During your play step, you may discard a sacrificeable card on your side to permanently increase this card's power by 1, to a maximum of 5.
sigils.Precalculation: During your end step, you may mark a gem-providing card on your side to search any card from your side deck. The marked card will not provide any gems until your next draw step, at which point the mark is removed.
sigils.School: Once per turn, you may pay 5 bones to search any Fish card or any card with "Waterborne" from your deck.
sigils.Sparkling Dust: Once Per turn during your play step, shatter a gem you control to permanently give 1 card you control 1 additional power on the first strike of each attack.

sigils.Trawl the Depths: Once per turn during your play step, you can make this card generate 2 bones. If so, attacks targeting it on your opponent's next turn will deal direct damage.
sigils.True Scholar: Once per turn during your play step, shatter a gem you control to draw 2 cards.
sigils.Unseelie Authority: Move the scales one point closer to yourself to decrease the cost of a card in your hand by 2 bones. If the card is a Spectre, you may reduce its cost by 3 bones instead.
sigils.Abundance: You may have up to six copies of this card in your deck.
sigils.Beastly: When playing this card, cards provide no more than one blood when sacrificed.
sigils.Boneless: This card does not drop a bone when it perishes.
sigils.Nine Lives: After sacrificing this card nine times, place an "Undead Cat" in its place.
sigils.Maw Power: This card's power is equal to 3 minus the number of gems on your side of the field.
sigils.Mirror Power: This card's power is equal to the opposing card's power.

sigils.Blood Power: This card's power is equal to the number of sacrifices you have made during this turn, to a maximum of 5.
sigils.Battery Power: This card's power is equal to the number of times you spent energy this turn.
sigils.Diamond Cost: This card's cost must be paid entirely with gems of unique colors.
sigils.Dice Power: When played, roll a six-sided die numbered 1-6. This card's power is equal to the result.
sigils.Fortune Teller Trait: After examining the cards shown by "Divination," add one of them to your hand.

sigils.Kraken trait: On your next draw step, place any "Tentacle" card over this one.

sigils.Gone trait: You may only play this card once per turn. This card does not drop a bone when it perishes.
sigils.Skeleton Army Trait: When played, play a "Skeleton" from your side deck in each empty space on your side.

sigils.Gem Fiend Trait: While this card is on the field, any "Gem Fiend" costs 1 more sapphire to play.
sigils.Gunbot Trait: While this card is not opposing another card, it has 0 power.
sigils.Ant Power: This card's power is equal to the number of Ant cards you control, excluding this one.

sigils.-2 Max: When played, reduce your max energy by 2.
sigils.-3 Max: When played, reduce your max energy by 3.
sigils.Captive File Trait: On its owner's second end step after this card is played, it is moved to the discard pile, but does not perish in the process.
sigils.Gnawed Remains Trait: While this card is on the field, you may play Hound cards for half their cost, rounded down.

sigils.Spine Ripper Trait: For each card in your discard with "Brittle," this card costs 1 less bone to play.
sigils.Pike Sage Trait: If this card has only 1 power, its strikes will simultaneously damage the opposing card and the scales directly.
sigils.Pharaoh's Pets Trait: After the first time this card is sacrificed, the effects of "Worthy Sacrifice" are nullified.
sigils.Pipe Bomb Trait: If this card loses its last point of health due to "Rotting," the effects of "Detonator" will trigger.
sigils.Umbral Puppeteer Trait: While this card is on the field, Umbral cards you control will not lose power during your end step.
sigils.Umbral Servant Trait: If you have not shattered any gems this turn, this card loses 1 power during your end step.
sigils.Prideful Princess Trait: This card may be run in the same deck as "Gracious Gardener."While this card is on the field, you may play "Gracious Gardener" without paying its cost.
